title: U.S. Natural Gas Prices Rebound Amid Robust LNG Flows
summary: U.S. natural gas futures have reversed their recent decline, climbing more than 3% on Thursday to trade above $4 per MMBtu thanks to near-record flows of natural gas to LNG export plants.
